Posts.EditableText: This is the MMPOG i play these days, its Awesome, expecially if you like movies!. The Creators of FFM even play it to!. In the Game your a CEO of a producing Company, you make movies etc, the Game has real world Actors and Directors, they have in game stats to. url is: [url:2j9l2yui]http://fantasyfilmmaker.net[/url:2j9l2yui]. You guys should give it a wirl, Nice game to play while working on Quest Games oh and my Company name on there is [b:2j9l2yui]Black Label[/b:2j9l2yui] and my CEO name is [b:2j9l2yui]Walter Cross[/b:2j9l2yui]. Nothing to download either, plays from your browser, just sign up!
